description: When I first spoke to Rocco on the phone, his deep voice and sexy Argentinean accent was a sexy preamble to meeting him in person. That handsome face, penetrating eyes and muscled body are worth the price of admission alone but he told me he had a unique penis. Not a Prince Albert ring at the tip, he has a silver bar with two balls at the ends on his shaft, an inch or so below the head. Once you see it, it's easy to understand that it hits just the right spot! His dick is thick, rock hard with a big pink mushroom head and add those two little silver balls; it looks like a mighty dragon.When he rubs that hot body, throws his head back, curls his toes and moans to a full roar of delight, you'll also see that that dragon spits when it gets mad. From the amount of sauce that pours out...he was very mad that day.
title: Piercing Distinction, Scene #02
